text:
Xerces throws a class cast exception:
try and validate the following schema. Xerces doesn't produce a line number or 
anything so I just have to show you my entire schema:
----------operations.xsd-----------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<schema xml:lang="en" xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'>
   <annotation>
      <documentation>
         Created      : 25/04/01
         Filename     : operations.xsd
         Description  : Describes operations to be performed by the bulk entry 
tool
         Project      : Enterprise
         Author(s)    : Nikolay Metchev

         Copyright    : (c) Teamphone.com Ltd. 2001 - All Rights Reserved
      </documentation>
   </annotation>

   <!-- include the types library and modules-->
   <include schemaLocation="types.xsd"/>
   <include schemaLocation="services.xsd"/>
   <include schemaLocation="teams.xsd"/>
   <include schemaLocation="person.xsd"/>

   <element name="bulkOperations">
      <complexType>
         <all>
            <element name="add"     type="AddType"    minOccurs="0"  
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
            <element name="remove"  type="RemoveType" minOccurs="0"  
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
            <element name="modify"  type="ModifyType" minOccurs="0"  
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         </all>
      </complexType>
   </element>

   <complexType name="ModifyType">
      <choice>
         <group ref="SubscriberGroup" minOccurs="0"   maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <group ref="ContactGroup"    minOccurs="0"   maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <group ref="TeamGroup"       minOccurs="0"   maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
      </choice>
   </complexType>

   <group name="TeamGroup">
      <sequence>
         <choice>
            <element name="lookForTeam"     type="DefaultTeamType"/>
            <element name="lookForAllTeams"  type="DefaultTeamType"/>
         </choice>
         <element name="changeToTeam"  type="DefaultTeamType"/>
      </sequence>
   </group>

   <group name="SubscriberGroup">
      <sequence>
         <choice>
            <element name="lookForSubscriber"      
type="DefaultSubscriberType"/>
            <element name="lookForAllSubscribers"  
type="DefaultSubscriberType"/>
         </choice>
         <element name="changeToSubscriber"  type="DefaultSubscriberType"/>
      </sequence>
   </group>

   <group name="ContactGroup">
      <sequence>
         <choice>
            <element name="lookForContact"      type="DefaultContactType"/>
            <element name="lookForAllContacts"  type="DefaultContactType"/>
         </choice>
         <element name="changeToContact"  type="DefaultContactType"/>
      </sequence>
   </group>


   <complexType name="RemoveType"   minOccurs="0">
      <all>
         <element name="lookForSubscriber"      type="DefaultSubscriberType"  
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <element name="lookForAllSubscribers"  type="DefaultSubscriberType"  
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <element name="lookForContact"         type="DefaultContactType"     
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <element name="lookForAllContacts"     type="DefaultContactType"     
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <element name="lookForTeam"            type="DefaultTeamType"        
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <element name="lookForAllTeams"        type="DefaultTeamType"        
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
      </all>   
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="AddType">
      <all>
         <element name="defaults" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="subscriberDefaults"  
type="DefaultSubscriberType" minOccurs="0"/>
                  <element name="contactDefaults"     
type="DefaultContactType"    minOccurs="0"/>
                  <element name="teamDefaults"        
type="DefaultTeamType"       minOccurs="0"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>      
         </element>
         <element name="subscribers" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="subscriber" type="StrictSubscriberType" 
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element name="contacts" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="contact" type="StrictContactType" 
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element name="teams" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="team" type="DefaultTeamType" minOccurs="0" 
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
      </all>         
   </complexType>

</schema>
-------------person.xsd------------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--<schema xml:lang="en" xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/10/XMLSchema'>-->
   <annotation>
      <documentation>
         Created      : 20/04/01
         Filename     : person.xsd
         Description  : Describes a person. It can be used for both subscribers 
and contacts.
         Project      : Enterprise
         Author(s)    : Nikolay Metchev

         Copyright    : (c) Teamphone.com Ltd. 2001 - All Rights Reserved
      </documentation>
   </annotation>

   <include schemaLocation="types.xsd"/>
   <include schemaLocation="services.xsd"/>
   <include schemaLocation="teams.xsd"/>

   <element name="contactInfo"      type="ContactInfoType"/>
   <element name="subscriberInfo"   type="SubscriberInfoType"/>

   <complexType name="DefaultSubscriberType">
      <all>
         <element name="defaultPersonInfo"   type="DefaultPersonInfoType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="contactInfo"                                       
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="subscriberInfo"                                    
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="services"            type="DefaultServicesType"   
minOccurs="0"/> 
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="DefaultContactType">
      <all>
         <element name="defaultPersonInfo" type="DefaultPersonInfoType"    
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="contactInfo"                                        
minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="StrictContactType">
      <all>
         <element name="personInfo" 
type="StrictPersonInfoType"                />
         <element ref="contactInfo"                               
minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
      <attribute ref="id" use="optional"/>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="StrictSubscriberType">
      <all>
         <element name="personInfo"    
type="StrictPersonInfoType"                />
         <element ref="contactInfo"                                  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="subscriberInfo"                               
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="services"      type="DefaultServicesType"    
minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
      <attribute ref="id" use="optional"/>
   </complexType>

   
   <complexType name="StrictPersonInfoType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="PersonInfoType">
            <all>
               <element name="displayName"     type="NameStringType" />
            </all>
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="DefaultPersonInfoType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="PersonInfoType">
            <all>
               <element name="displayName"     type="NameStringType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
            </all>
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>


   <complexType name="PersonInfoType" abstract="true">
      <sequence> <!--This needs to be changed to <all> when Xerces supports it -
->
         <element name="firstName"       type="NameStringType"      
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="middleName"      type="NameStringType"      
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="lastName"        type="NameStringType"      
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="description"     type="string"              
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="employeeNumber"  type="EmployeeNumberType"  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="photo"           type="anyURI"              
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="URL"             type="anyURI"              
minOccurs="0"/>         
         <element name="nameRecording"   type="anyURI"              
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="gcID"            type="NumericalStringType" 
minOccurs="0"/> 
      </sequence>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="ContactInfoType">
      <all>
         <element name="office"     type="OfficeContactInfoType"     
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="home"       type="HomeContactInfoType"       
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="mobile"     type="MobileTelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="pager"      type="TelephoneNumberType"       
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="gcID"       type="gcIDType"                  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="security"                                    
minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="publishTo" type="PublishToType"/>   
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element name="teamMemberships" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="team" type="TeamReferenceType" 
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="SubscriberInfoType">
      <sequence> <!--This needs to be changed to <all> when Xerces supports it -
->
         <element name="language"            type="LanguageType"              
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="temporaryNumber"     type="TemporaryPhoneNumberType"  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="location"            type="LocationType"              
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="mood"                type="MoodType"                  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="classOfService"      type="ClassOfServiceType"        
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="faxMood"             type="MoodType"                  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="faxClassOfService"   type="ClassOfServiceType"        
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="resetLocationTo"     type="LocationType"              
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="resetMoodTo"         type="MoodType"                  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="mailClient"          type="MailClientType"            
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="calendarClient"      type="CalendarClientType"        
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="voiceMailAccess"     type="VoiceMailAccessType"       
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="subscriberID"        type="SubscriberIDType"          
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="accountCode"         type="AccountCodeType"           
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="seeAlso"             type="PersonReferenceType"       
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="security"                                             
minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <sequence>
                  <choice>
                     <group ref="PasswordGroup"/>
                     <element name="synchronisedPassword" 
type="TUIPasswordType" minOccurs="0"/>
                  </choice>
                  <element name="passwordExpiryDate"  type="date" 
minOccurs="0"/>
               </sequence>
            </complexType>
         </element>
      </sequence>
   </complexType>

   <group name="PasswordGroup">
      <sequence>
         <element name="directoryPassword"   type="DirectoryPasswordType"  
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="TUIPassword"         type="TUIPasswordType"        
minOccurs="0"/>
      </sequence>
   </group>

   <complexType name="HomeContactInfoType">
      <all>
         <element name="telephoneNumber"  type="TelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="fax"              type="TelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="address"          type="AddressType"         
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="email"            type="EmailType"           
minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="OfficeContactInfoType">
      <all>
         <element name="organisation"     type="OrganisationType"    
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="deskTelephoneNumber"  type="TelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="fax"              type="TelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="address"          type="AddressType"         
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="manager"          type="PersonReferenceType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="secretary"        type="PersonReferenceType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="email"            type="EmailType"           
minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>

</schema>
------------------teams.xsd------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<schema xml:lang="en" xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'>


   <annotation>
      <documentation>
         Created      : 20/04/01
         Filename     : teams.xsd
         Description  : Describes a team in the teamphone directory
         Project      : Enterprise
         Author(s)    : Nikolay Metchev

         Copyright    : (c) Teamphone.com Ltd. 2001 - All Rights Reserved
      </documentation>
   </annotation>

   <include schemaLocation="types.xsd"/>
   <include schemaLocation="person.xsd"/>


   <element name="teamInfo"         type="TeamInfoType"     minOccurs="0"/>
   <element name="teamContactInfo"  type="TeamContactInfo"  minOccurs="0"/>
   <element name="teamSecurity"     type="TeamSecurityType" minOccurs="0"/>
   <element name="teamAdvanced"     type="TeamAdvancedType" minoccurs="0"/>

   <complexType name="DefaultTeamType">
      <all>
         <element ref="teamInfo"                                     
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="teamContactInfo"                              
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="services"                                    
minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="service" type="ServiceReferenceType" 
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element name="members" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="member" type="TeamMembersType"     
minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element ref="teamSecurity"                                 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="teamAdvanced"                                 
minOccurs="0"/>   
      </all>
      <attribute ref="id" use="optional"/>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="TeamMembersType">
      <choice>
         <element name="subscriber" type="PersonReferenceType" minOccurs="0" 
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <element name="contact"    type="PersonReferenceType" minOccurs="0" 
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
         <element name="team"       type="TeamReferenceType"   minOccurs="0" 
maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
      </choice>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="TeamInfoType">
      <sequence><!-- will have to be changed to all when Xerces supports it-->
         <element name="logo"                type="anyURI"                 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="name"                type="TeamNameType"           
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="nameRecording"       type="anyURI"                 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="teamID"              type="TeamIDType"             
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="leader"              type="PersonReferenceType"    
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="administrator"       type="PersonReferenceType"    
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="language"            type="LanguageType"           
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="organisation"        type="OrganisationType"       
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="organisationalUnit"  type="OrganisationalUnitType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="businessCategory"    type="BusinessCategoryType"   
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="URL"                 type="anyURI"                 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="description"         type="string"                 
minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="seeAlso"             type="PersonReferenceType"    
minOccurs="0"/>
      </sequence>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="TeamContactInfo">
      <all>
         <element name="telephoneNumbers" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <all>
                  <element name="team"       type="TelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
                  <element name="fax"        type="TelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
                  <element name="voiceMail"  type="TelephoneNumberType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
               </all>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element name="email" type="EmailType" minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="TeamSecurityType">
      <all>
         <element name="publishTo"     type="PublishToType"/>
         <element name="accountCode"   type="AccountCodeType"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="TeamAdvancedType">
      <all>
         <element name="defaultTeamNumberService"     type 
= "ServiceReferenceType" minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="defaultVoiceMailDropService"  type 
= "ServiceReferenceType" minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>      
   </complexType>

</schema>
------------------------------------types.xsd---------------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<schema xml:lang="en" xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'>

   
   <annotation>
      <documentation>
         Created      : 23/04/01
         Filename     : types.xsd
         Description  : a definition of all types used in XML schema for 
describing the teamphone directory
         Project      : Enterprise
         Author(s)    : Nikolay Metchev

         Copyright    : (c) Teamphone.com Ltd. 2001 - All Rights Reserved
      </documentation>
   </annotation>

   <!--Common elements-->
   <element name="reference">
      <complexType>
         <attribute name="value" type="IDREF"/>
      </complexType>
   </element>

   <!--common attributes-->
   <attribute name="id" type="ID"/>


   <!--complex types-->
   <complexType name="TeamReferenceType">
      <choice>
         <element ref="reference"/>
         <element name="teamID" type="TeamIDType"/>
         <element name="teamName" type="TeamNameType"/>
      </choice>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="ServiceReferenceType">
      <choice>
         <element ref="reference"/>
         <element name="serviceID" type="ServiceIDType"/>
      </choice>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="PersonReferenceType">
      <choice>
         <element name="subscriberID"  type="SubscriberIDType"/>
         <element name="contactID"     type="SubscriberIDType"/>
         <element ref="reference"    />
      </choice>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="AddressType" mixed="true">
      <all>
         <element name="country"    type="CountryType"      minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="locality"   type="LocalityType"     minOccurs="0"/>
         <element name="postalCode" type="PostalCodeType"   minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>                                


   <complexType name="MailClientType">
      <all>
         <element name="email"       type  ="EmailType"/>
         <element name="password"   type   ="EmailPasswordType"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="CalendarClientType">
      <all>
         <element name="calendarID"       type="CalendarNameType"/>
         <element name="calendarPassword" type="CalendarPasswordType"/>
      </all>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="AccountCodeType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="RangeType"/>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="RangeType">
      <choice>
         <element name="range">
            <complexType>
               <attribute name="from"  type="NumericalStringType" 
use="required"/>
               <attribute name="to"    type="NumericalStringType" 
use="required"/>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element name="value">
            <complexType>
               <attribute name="value" type="NumericalStringType" 
use="required"/>
            </complexType>
         </element>               
      </choice>
   </complexType>

   <!--Simple Types-->

   <!--PASSWORD TYPES NEED TO BE MADE SECURE (SHOULD BE MADE BINARY)-->
   <simpleType name="EmailPasswordType">
      <restriction base="string"/> 
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="DirectoryPasswordType">
      <restriction base="string"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="TUIPasswordType">
      <restriction base="string"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="CalendarPasswordType">
      <restriction base="string"/>
   </simpleType>

   <!--Teampone Types-->
   <simpleType name="SubscriberIDType">
      <restriction base="nonNegativeInteger"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="ServiceIDType">
      <restriction base="nonNegativeInteger"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="TeamIDType">
      <restriction base="nonNegativeInteger"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="EmailType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="CalendarNameType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="PostalCodeType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>
   
   <simpleType name="TeamNameType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="LocalityType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="TelephoneNumberType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <maxLength value="32"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="MailBoxNumberType">
      <restriction base="NumericalStringType">
         <maxLength value="32"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="gcIDType">
      <restriction base="NumericalStringType">
         <maxLength value="32"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <complexType name="MobileTelephoneNumberType">
      <simpleContent>
         <extension base="TelephoneNumberType">
            <attribute name="sms" type="boolean" default="true"/>
         </extension>
      </simpleContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="TemporaryPhoneNumberType">
      <simpleContent>
         <extension base="TelephoneNumberType">
            <attribute name="expire" type="boolean" default="false"/>
         </extension>
      </simpleContent>
   </complexType>

   <simpleType name="NameStringType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="OrganisationType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="OrganisationalUnitType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   
   <simpleType name="BusinessCategoryType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="EmployeeNumberType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <!--Enumerations -->
   <simpleType name="CountryType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="AFGHANISTAN"/>
         <enumeration value="AF"/>
         <enumeration value="ALBANIA"/>
         <enumeration value="AL"/>
         <enumeration value="ALGERIA"/>
         <enumeration value="DZ"/>
         <enumeration value="AMERICAN SAMOA"/>
         <enumeration value="AS"/>
         <enumeration value="ANDORRA"/>
         <enumeration value="AD"/>
         <enumeration value="ANGOLA"/>
         <enumeration value="AO"/>
         <enumeration value="ANGUILLA"/>
         <enumeration value="AI"/>
         <enumeration value="ANTARCTICA"/>
         <enumeration value="AQ"/>
         <enumeration value="ANTIGUA AND BARBUDA"/>
         <enumeration value="AG"/>
         <enumeration value="ARGENTINA"/>
         <enumeration value="AR"/>
         <enumeration value="ARMENIA"/>
         <enumeration value="AM"/>
         <enumeration value="ARUBA"/>
         <enumeration value="AW"/>
         <enumeration value="AUSTRALIA"/>
         <enumeration value="AU"/>
         <enumeration value="AUSTRIA"/>
         <enumeration value="AT"/>
         <enumeration value="AZERBAIJAN"/>
         <enumeration value="AZ"/>
         <enumeration value="BAHAMAS"/>
         <enumeration value="BS"/>
         <enumeration value="BAHRAIN"/>
         <enumeration value="BH"/>
         <enumeration value="BANGLADESH"/>
         <enumeration value="BD"/>
         <enumeration value="BARBADOS"/>
         <enumeration value="BB"/>
         <enumeration value="BELARUS"/>
         <enumeration value="BY"/>
         <enumeration value="BELGIUM"/>
         <enumeration value="BE"/>
         <enumeration value="BELIZE"/>
         <enumeration value="BZ"/>
         <enumeration value="BENIN"/>
         <enumeration value="BJ"/>
         <enumeration value="BERMUDA"/>
         <enumeration value="BM"/>
         <enumeration value="BHUTAN"/>
         <enumeration value="BT"/>
         <enumeration value="BOLIVIA"/>
         <enumeration value="BO"/>
         <enumeration value="BOSNIA AND HERZEGOWINA"/>
         <enumeration value="BA"/>
         <enumeration value="BOTSWANA"/>
         <enumeration value="BW"/>
         <enumeration value="BOUVET ISLAND"/>
         <enumeration value="BV"/>
         <enumeration value="BRAZIL"/>
         <enumeration value="BR"/>
         <enumeration value="BRITISH INDIAN OCEAN TERRITORY"/>
         <enumeration value="IO"/>
         <enumeration value="BRUNEI DARUSSALAM"/>
         <enumeration value="BN"/>
         <enumeration value="BULGARIA"/>
         <enumeration value="BG"/>
         <enumeration value="BURKINA FASO"/>
         <enumeration value="BF"/>
         <enumeration value="BURUNDI"/>
         <enumeration value="BI"/>
         <enumeration value="CAMBODIA"/>
         <enumeration value="KH"/>
         <enumeration value="CAMEROON"/>
         <enumeration value="CM"/>
         <enumeration value="CANADA"/>
         <enumeration value="CA"/>
         <enumeration value="CAPE VERDE"/>
         <enumeration value="CV"/>
         <enumeration value="CAYMAN ISLANDS"/>
         <enumeration value="KY"/>
         <enumeration value="CENTRAL AFRICAN REPUBLIC"/>
         <enumeration value="CF"/>
         <enumeration value="CHAD"/>
         <enumeration value="TD"/>
         <enumeration value="CHILE"/>
         <enumeration value="CL"/>
         <enumeration value="CHINA"/>
         <enumeration value="CN"/>
         <enumeration value="CHRISTMAS ISLAND"/>
         <enumeration value="CX"/>
         <enumeration value="COCOS (KEELING) ISLANDS"/>
         <enumeration value="CC"/>
         <enumeration value="COLOMBIA"/>
         <enumeration value="CO"/>

         <enumeration value="VIRGIN ISLANDS (BRITISH)"/>

         <enumeration value="VIRGIN ISLANDS (U.S)"/>

         <enumeration value="YEMEN"/>
         <enumeration value="YE"/>
         <enumeration value="YUGOSLAVIA"/>
         <enumeration value="YU"/>
         <enumeration value="ZAIRE"/>

         <enumeration value="ZAMBIA"/>
         <enumeration value="ZM"/>
         <enumeration value="ZIMBABWE"/>
         <enumeration value="ZW"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <!--Teamphone Specific Enumerations-->
   <simpleType name="ScenarioType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Current Location->Take Message->Delegate-
>Operator"/>
         <enumeration value="Current Location->Delegate->Take Message-
>Operator"/>
         <enumeration value="Delegate->Current Location->Take Message-
>Operator"/>
         <enumeration value="Holiday (Delegate->Take Message->Operator)"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="LocationType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Desk"/>
         <enumeration value="Home"/>
         <enumeration value="Mobile"/>
         <enumeration value="Temporary"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="MoodType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Receive Calls"/>
         <enumeration value="PC Ring"/>
         <enumeration value="Voice Mail"/>
         <enumeration value="Delegate Calls"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="CallScreeningType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="On"/>
         <enumeration value="Off"/>
         <enumeration value="On + Password"/>
         <enumeration value="Delegate Only"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="ClassOfServiceType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Office Hot Desker"/>
         <enumeration value="Hot Desker"/>
         <enumeration value="Executive"/>
         <enumeration value="Unrestricted"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="FaxOptionType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Fax Receive"/>
         <enumeration value="Fax Back"/>
         <enumeration value="Reverse Poll Fax Back"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="AlertType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Current Location"/>
         <enumeration value="Pager"/>
         <enumeration value="Message Waiting Light"/>
         <enumeration value="SMS"/>
         <enumeration value="Fax To Email"/>
         <enumeration value="Voice To Email"/>
         <enumeration value="Alert By Email"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="VoiceMailAccessType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Web"/>
         <enumeration value="Callback"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="PublishToType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Public"/>
         <enumeration value="Private"/>
         <enumeration value="Staff"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="CallReportType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="Lost Calls"/>
         <enumeration value="Delegated Calls"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="LanguageType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <enumeration value="English"/>
         <enumeration value="Spanish"/>
         <enumeration value="Dutch"/>
         <enumeration value="French"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <!--Generic types-->
   <simpleType name="NumericalStringType">
      <restriction base="normalizedString">
         <pattern value="[\d]*"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

   <!--will have to remove the types below this line when Xerces supports these 
default data types-->
   <simpleType name="anyURI">
      <restriction base="normalizedString"/>
   </simpleType>

   <simpleType name="normalizedString">
      <restriction base="string">
         <whiteSpace value="collapse"/>
      </restriction>
   </simpleType>

</schema>

---------------------Services.xsd------------------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE schema [
   <!ENTITY NUMBER_OF_ALERTS "7">
   <!ENTITY NUMBER_OF_CALL_REPORTS "2">
]>
<schema xml:lang="en" xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'>

   <annotation>
      <documentation>
         Created      : 24/04/01
         Filename     : services.xsd
         Description  : Describes services which appear in the teamphone product
         Project      : Enterprise
         Author(s)    : Nikolay Metchev

         Copyright    : (c) Teamphone.com Ltd. 2001 - All Rights Reserved
      </documentation>
   </annotation>

   <include schemaLocation="types.xsd"/>

   <!-- the elements that make up the services-->
   <element name="findMe"                 type="FindMeType"                />
   <element name="fax"                    type="FaxType"                   />
   <element name="alerts"                 type="AlertsType"                />
   <element name="operatorTransfer"       type="OperatorTransferType"      />
   <element name="thirdPartyVoiceMail"    type="ThirdPartyVoiceMailType"   />
   <element name="teamphoneVoiceMail"     type="TeamphoneVoiceMailType"    />
   <element name="urgentCalls"            type="UrgentCallsType"           />
   <element name="callFilter"             type="CallFilterType"            />
   <element name="callBarge"              type="CallBargeType"             />
   <element name="immediateRedirect"      type="ImmediateRedirectType"     />
   <element name="subscriberManagement"   type="SubscriberManagementType"  />

   <complexType name="DefaultServicesType">
      <sequence>   <!--this will have to be changed to all when Xerces supports 
it-->
         <element ref="findMe"               minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="fax"                  minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="alerts"               minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="operatorTransfer"     minOccurs="0"/>
         <group   ref="VoiceMailGroup"                    />
         <element ref="urgentCalls"          minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="callFilter"           minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="subscriberManagement" minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="callBarge"            minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="immediateRedirect"    minOccurs="0"/>
      </sequence>
   </complexType>

   <group name = "VoiceMailGroup">
      <choice>
         <element ref="thirdPartyVoiceMail"  minOccurs="0"/>
         <element ref="teamphoneVoiceMail"   minOccurs="0"/>
      </choice>
   </group>

   <!-- the services types -->
   <complexType name="AlertsType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="ServiceType">
            <sequence>
               <element name="alert" type="AlertType" minOccurs="0" 
maxOccurs="&NUMBER_OF_ALERTS;"/>
            </sequence>
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="FindMeType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base = "ServiceType">
            <all>
               <element name="routedFrom" type="RangeType" minOccurs="0"/>
               <element name="scenario" type="ScenarioType" minOccurs="0"/>
               <element name="delegate"                     minOccurs="0">
                  <complexType>
                     <choice>
                        <element name="subscriber" type="PersonReferenceType" 
minOccurs="0"/>
                        <element name="team"       type="TeamReferenceType"   
minOccurs="0"/>
                     </choice>
                  </complexType>
               </element>
               <element name="callReports" minOccurs="0">
                  <complexType>
                     <sequence>
                        <element name="callReport" type="CallReportType" 
maxOccurs="&NUMBER_OF_CALL_REPORTS;"/>
                     </sequence>
                  </complexType>
               </element>
            </all>
            <attribute name="faxDetection"                        
type="boolean"             default="false" use="optional"/>
            <attribute name="duet"                                
type="boolean"             default="false" use="optional"/>
            <attribute name="delegateBeforeThirdPartyVoiceMail"   
type="boolean"             default="false" use="optional"/>
            <attribute name="callScreening"                       
type="CallScreeningType"   default="Off" use="optional"/>
        </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="FaxType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="ServiceType">
            <all>
               <element name="routedFrom" type="RangeType" minOccurs="0"/>
               <element name="administrator" type="PersonReferenceType"    
minOccurs="0"/>
               <element name="option"        type="FaxOptionType"          
minOccurs="0"/>
               <element name="transferTo"    type="ServiceReferenceType"   
minOccurs="0"/>
            </all>
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="OperatorTransferType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="ServiceType">
            <all>
               <element name="recordings" minOccurs="0">
                  <complexType>
                     <all>
                        <element name="office"        type="anyURI" 
minOccurs="0"/>
                        <element name="outOfOffice"   type="anyURI" 
minOccurs="0"/>
                        <element name="holiday"       type="anyURI" 
minOccurs="0"/>
                        <element name="emergency"     type="anyURI" 
minOccurs="0"/>
                     </all>
                  </complexType>
               </element>
            </all>   
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="TeamphoneVoiceMailType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="ServiceType">
            <group ref="GreetingsGroup"/>
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="ThirdPartyVoiceMailType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="ServiceType">
            <all>
               <element name="mailboxNumber" type="MailBoxNumberType"/>
            </all>
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>


   <group name="GreetingsGroup">
      <all>
         <element name="permanentGreetings" minOccurs="0">
            <complexType>
               <choice>
                  <group ref="GreetingGroup"/>
                  <element name="permanent" type="anyURI" minOccurs="0"/>   
               </choice>
            </complexType>
         </element>
         <element name="temporaryGreeting" type="anyURI" minOccurs="0"/>
      </all>
   </group>

   <group name="GreetingGroup">
      <sequence>
         <element name="internal"  type="anyURI" minOccurs="0"/>   
         <element name="external"  type="anyURI" minOccurs="0"/>   
      </sequence>
   </group>

   <complexType name="SubscriberManagementType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base = "RoutedServiceType"/>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="UrgentCallsType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base = "RoutedServiceType"/>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="CallFilterType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base = "RoutedServiceType"/>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="CallBargeType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base = "RoutedServiceType"/>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="ImmediateRedirectType">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base = "RoutedServiceType"/>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>


   <!--Abstract Types-->
   <complexType name="ServiceType"        abstract="true">
      <attribute ref="id" use="optional"/>
   </complexType>

   <complexType name="RoutedServiceType"  abstract="true">
      <complexContent>
         <extension base="ServiceType">
            <sequence>
               <element name="routedFrom" type="RangeType" minOccurs="0"/>
            </sequence>
         </extension>
      </complexContent>
   </complexType>

</schema>

-------------------test.xml---------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bulkOperations xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="operations.xsd">
</bulkOperations>
creator: nikolaymetchev@gmail.com

text:
Bug was caused when an included schema contained a group with a ref attribute 
and that group was processed before the group being ref'd.
creator: neilg@ca.ibm.com
